org.sql: SELECT relations.* FROM relations INNER JOIN (SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True)) AS visible_from ON visible_from.id = relations.from_id INNER JOIN (SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True)) AS visible_to ON visible_to.id = relations.to_id WHERE relations.hierarchy = "$1" AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.id IN ('854', '858') ORDER BY relations.id DESC LIMIT "$2" OFFSET "$3"

rewrites.sql: SELECT relations.* FROM relations INNER JOIN (SELECT work_packages.id FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT projects.id FROM projects INNER JOIN enabled_modules ON projects.id = enabled_modules.project_id AND enabled_modules.name IN ('work_package_tracking') AND projects.active = True WHERE projects.active = True)) AS visible_from ON visible_from.id = relations.from_id WHERE relations.hierarchy = "$1" AND hierarchy + relates + duplicates + follows + blocks + includes + requires = 1 AND relations.id IN ('854', '858') ORDER BY relations.id DESC LIMIT "$2" OFFSET "$3"
